Title: Authorizes the town justice of the town of Montour to be a nonresident of such town
Summary: Authorizes the town justice of the town of Montour, county of Schuyler, to be a nonresident of such town.
LawCode: Amd ยง23, Town L; amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law and the public officers law, in relation to authorizing the town justice of the town of Montour, county of Schuyler, to be a nonresident of such town
